duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and implement RPA solutions using UiPath, Blue Prism, or similar tools.
Analyze business processes and identify areas for RPA application to improve efficiency.
Collaborate with stakeholders to identify opportunities for process improvement and innovation.
Create and maintain technical documentation to support automation processes.
Conduct unit and integration testing to ensure RPA solutions meet functional requirements.
Provide ongoing support for RPA solutions, including identifying and resolving technical issues.
Design and develop reporting based on automation requirements to track performance and quality metrics.
Communicate project progress and status to leadership and development team members.
Create business solutions using knowledge and application of multiple technologies and applications.
Review existing RPA code packages for quality improvements.
Perform regression testing on RPA packages after new deployments.
Keep up-to-date with the latest trends and developments in RPA technology.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, or related discipline, or 4+ years professional experience in one of these disciplines
